definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in valley of [[בֶּן־תִנּׁם]], S. of Jerusalem (etym. doubtful, v. GFM:Ency. Bib. MOLECH ; RS:Sem. i. 357, 2nd ed. 372, 377 al. think Aram., = fire-place, cf. [[שׁפת]]);—c. art. ´[[הַתּ]]: 2Ki 23:10 + 5 t., art. om. Je 7:32, Je 19:11, Je 19:12;—place of sacrificing children Je 7:31, cf. v:Je 7:32 a, Je 19:6 (cf. v:Je 19:5), 2Ki 23:10; to become burial-place Je 7:32 Je 19:11; in sim. of desecrated city v:Je 19:12; v:Je 19:13 (´[[מְקוֹם הַתּ]]:); scene of a prophecy of Jerem., v:Je 19:14;—Tafev, Tafeq (cf. Lag:BN 78), LXXL:2Ki 23:10 Qaffeq.—Vid. GFM:l.c. Salmond:Hast.DB TOPHET.
